about_the_game:
Choose to pilot a P-Type Jet Fighter, join Harrier Squadron, or play as an Immersive Gamer in the cockpit of the P-Type Fighter as you strive for a high score and take battle to the skies as you face off against these Alien Invaders as you serve the "Polybius Space Force"

This super-scaled shoot 'em up explodes onto the scene with pinball-inspired scoring mechanics that'll have you racking up points and racking up thrills. Forget your dusty old flippers, you have guns, Polybius Invaders 2 throws you headfirst into a neon-drenched battle for Earth against the invading Arcadians.

Rack up points like a pro with chain reactions, multipliers, and hidden combos. Every enemy blast, every asteroid shattered, every pixel pulverized feeds your score meter, unlocking epic upgrades, missions and devastating power-ups.

Polybius Invaders 2 is more than just a shoot 'em up, it's a high-score chasing, pixel-perfect party! So grab your joystick, crank up Teknoaxe's synthwave soundtrack, and prepare to nuke the Arcadian menace in Polybius Invaders 2!

Download the demo of the Nuke Town table, but Remember, The full game explodes with even more missions, enemies, and pixelated mayhem!

Blast off into the stratosphere and ignite your Nitro Boost as you embark on exhilarating missions of relentless retro super-scaling arcade action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i5-750 2.7GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Earth's fate hangs in the balance in this breathtaking retro inspired, Super Scaler Arcade Shoot-Em-Up.
